content: I think that's a great idea. I'll send a message to the organizer and see what they say. I'll also try to be more open-minded and not overthink it. Thanks for the tips and advice! One thing I'm still worried about is that I haven't really been socializing with anyone regularly since my best friend moved away, and I'm not sure if I'll be able to connect with people or if I'll stick out like a sore thumb.
